entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporal Tables support for InMemoryDatabase #26717
  • Reverse Engineering issue with user permissions #26716
  • NorthwindSplitIncludeQuery test depend on specific implicit ordering and are hard to fix #26715
    7.0.0
  • Update Attach docs to reference cascade delete/delete orphans timing #26718
    MQ
  • Incorrect optional dependent (owned type) warning when saving optional dependent with the _same_ data #26712
  • NotMapped property's entitytype getting added to modelBuilder.Model #26709
    7.0.0
  • Stop generating composite keys for owned collections on SQLite #26708
    7.0.0
  • TemporalAll() in Temporal Tables with child entity gives System.InvalidOperationException when used with Include() #26704
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection... using Union or Concat #26703
  • Method not found: 'System.Type Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ITypeBase.get_ClrType()'. #26701

Closed

  • How to resolve an IExecutionStrategy? #26710
  • Proxies using Records with a base class broken since .NET 6 #26602
  • SqliteCommand._preparedStatements list initialized with 0 capacity #26294
    7.0.0
  • SqliteCommand.GetStatements unnecessarily gets parameter count for prepared statement #26298
    7.0.0
  • SqliteConnection.Open/Close allocate StateChangeEventArgs per every call #26283
    7.0.0
  • Query: model building for temporal table with explicitly defined period columns could fail if conventions are executed in a delayed fashion #26705
  • InvalidOperationException "sequence contains no matching element" in TableReferenceExpression.get_Table #26587
    6.0.1
  • Bug in EFCore under .NET 6 when using records with inheritance and lazy loading #26714
  • filtered include generates invalid SQL with First() but not with ToList() #26585
  • Running dotnet ef global tool in .NET 6 on Mac with M1 raises: Failed to load /usr/local/share/dotnet/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/3.1.20/libhostpolicy.dylib #26650
  • Update C# Documentation to give unit testing examples #26589
  • Manual DetectChanges() call does not take navigation properties into account #26554
  • [6.0][CosmosDB] DateTime with z suffix is not respected when reading entities. #26690
    6.0.1
  • [Q] Complex data as value of Annotation #26655
  • Invalid SQL generated for SQL server when grouping by complex (calculated) properties #26654
  • Stack overflow when using circular composite key dependencies #26629
    6.0.1
  • Bundle-Migration failing #26501
  • efcore6 produces wrong SELECT SQL when Where/OrderBy clauses are applied to Owned properties followed by .Take() #26592
    7.0.0
  • efcore 6 bundle error #26479
  • .NET 6 InMemoryDatabase RowVersion required on adding new record #26649

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Adding support for owned types mapped to same table as well as different tables #26706

Merged

  • Remove quirks from main #26711
  • Cache ParamCount together with a statement for SQLite #26380
  • Set default capacity of prepared Statements #26514
  • Cache Eventargs in SQLiteConnection #26291
    community-contribution
  • Evolve null-checking approach in SQLite provider #26535
  • [6.0.x] Cosmos: Use configured serializer when reading #26702
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1

Updated

  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • Fix some markdown language syntax highlights #26680
    community-contribution
  • Query: Avoid parethesis around binary operations when used with AND/OR #26661
